description: The image features a vibrant advertisement for a Spring season sale at a fashion retailer. The design prominently displays a beautiful floral pattern as the background, incorporating various blooming flowers in shades of blue and white. The flowers are arranged artistically, creating a fresh and inviting atmosphere that embodies the essence of Spring. The advertisement includes a bold and eye-catching banner that announces a '50% DISCOUNT' on select items, emphasizing the exciting offer. The call to action, 'SHOP NOW', is prominently displayed in a stylish font, encouraging potential customers to take immediate action.

captions.background: The background features a delicate floral pattern with various blue and white flowers in full bloom, creating a fresh and vibrant Spring vibe.
captions.objects: The main objects in the advertisement include the bold text '50% DISCOUNT' in a striking font that stands out against the floral backdrop. Below this, the call to action 'SHOP NOW' is displayed in a stylish, modern font to attract attention and motivate action.
